sentences.english: I'm steaming mad at him because he always enters into rivalry with me.
sentences.chinese: 他总是和我唱对台戏，气得我要命。

sentences.english: The kids always sided with their mother against me.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们总是和妈妈站在一起，跟我唱对台戏。

sentences.english: They challenge us with opposing views.
